attributes.action: Close early years settings in tier 4
attributes.additional_details: Put the policies of opening schools in tier 4 areas in line with early years settings and nurseries.
attributes.background: Early years practitioners and children under the age of five who are in nurseries and day care centres/ child minders deserve to be protected from the virus mutation. It is spreading fast and many of the staff members and families are very nervous to go back in the new year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
